lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson is running out of time to validate what quietly has been a good year, minus only a victory.

headline.print_headline: Mickelson Doesn't Need Win to Validate a Good Year
headline.main: Mickelson Doesn't Need Win to Validate a Good Year
